content.detailedDescription: I had my first experience around age 7 and continued until i was 30 yrs old, i was told by my family doctor today that i really need to contact ufo investigators to help me, i suffer from a lot of phobias,and anixity that seems to steam from abductions, he believes, i hate typin so please bare with me, my first encounter was at age 7 i was in my bedroom ,where i still live and i heard a weird sound outside , as i looked out my window i saw this huge disc shaped air craft hoovering over my inground swimming pool there was a beam of light from the center of the craft going in to my pool, i ran screaming for my grandma,as her foot steped in my room the beam shut off and it lifted straight up and flew west, within a few seconds,,next major event i was in my bedroom, and had just layed down, my room filled up with a bright neon green light,i felt paralized, unable to move,i couldnt move i saw 3 little people,grey in color big heads, little skinny bodys, i felt like i was being takin and returned at the same time, when the light went off i jumped up and had clear liquids pouring out of my nose and ears,shortly after  i was on my monthly period and i lost this weird bean shaped  thing, i couldnt pop it,with anything,kniffs, needles, nothing it was shaped like a kidney bean,i can explain more on the phone, i still have the pod burried in my yard,,i cant believe im telling u about this pod,,please believe me, i have witnesses this is so embarrising for my to speak about,,ill take a polygraph,i promise im trlling the truth,,,there were more things in between and after ,,many more this is just the bigger events, please help me , i want my life back i need closier or answers ...Please
content.summary: I have seen 3 types,

content.detailedDescription:
Was outdoors facing the west about 11:30 p.M. looked up into the sky and saw a red object that seemed star-like and hovering. i got my binoculars out to see if i could zoom in and it appeared the object was flickering various colors.  upon watching this object it appeared to move in a north-western direction.  i watched the object from inside my home and began feeling sick, dizzy, scared and nervous.  locked all my doors, shut the blinds and tried to sleep, but started having sleep panic attacks (panic while falling asleep).  i felt like something was watching me and possibly in my house.  i have a history of sleep panic, but have not experienced them in over a year until last night.  i also have a long history of seeing ufos, which i have documented almost all of them on mufon.

my adult daughter witnessed the light as well.  none of us in the house slept well last night.

i took two pictures and thought i was capturing one object, but upon review of the pictures there are two objects; both appear to be the same type of object and color.  you  need to download the photos and zoom in to at least 50% or more to see them.  they are in the left/center bottom of the pictures on both shots.
content.summary: Red, star-like object observed with flickering colors

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 8:45 pm est in boca raton, florida. i walked out of my office (about 2 miles from the beach) turned east to walk to my jeep and noticed the object. immediately, the object stood out due to the bright glow around the object in the sky. the glow was so bright and the shape of this bright glow was so large and odd that it would make anyone stop. now, i am not talking about the object itself there, i am talking about the glow in front of the object and to the sides. it looked as if it were almost breaking a sound barrier the was the shape of this glow was around the object. it was like nothing i have ever witnessed. also, there were two blinking lights trailing behind this main light with the glow, almost as if it were behind escorted. 

when i noticed this the first thought that came to mind was as if it were almost like a blimp with a huge spot light around itself that was being escorted by helicopter or planes (only a blimp came to mind cause of how slow it was moving, not the shape, and the light was just unexplainable and so bright). i called over my friend who was leaving work as well and he was as taken back as i was by this. for the first few second we were trying to figure out how this could be a plane of anything else that we could explain we could not. 

once we realized the object was something different than what we have ever seen, the glowing aura started to fade (which is where my video picks up). the two lights trailing became very very close to this front object and at that point, the main object released this white mist, fog, gas? something! it was very bright, as if it released a firework or something that made us flip out. at this point, there was no doubt in my mind that this was something different. my heart sank, started beating very rapidly and the feeling of watching this is difficult to portray. 

after this object released what ever it released, it started to gain distance from the other two blinking lights. though, the two lights still followed behind the main object. at that point, the object seemed to have changed its course from south to south east and seemed to have been flying out over the ocean, the two lights follow. it then becomes stationary over the horizon still in plain view, the other two lights are now about 40 degrees below to the left and a little distance between the main object. they were all still for about 30 seconds. as i am on the phone trying to explain to my girlfriend about the light that was released, the main object, which is stationary, starts to release the light again. it looks like it had a red tint this time but not as much was released. it could have been the growing distance which made it look dimmer, but it was still noticeable. the object then vanished from view. it did not fly out of sight, it just went away. 
i have a video of this. of the white light being released is the clearest point of the video. it had my heart beating for hours. i have seen many and many rockets launch, this was not that. i do not know what it was, but it was worth spending 20 minutes of my time doing this. if you want the video, email me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White light, bright barrier light surrounding the object. two blinking glowing lights trailing this light, then a large white mist was released from the back of the main glowing light. it then changed direction and gained distance from the other two light

content.detailedDescription: I already submitted a report aug 3rd on this so to many of you it would  sound like you read this. but the only reason i am rewriting it is because i had typed in that it was spotted in chicago but no it was spotted in a suburb of chicago called clarendon hills and it bothered me that i wrote chicago. when filling out the paper i thought they meant basic area. basically i was on my way home from the town of hinsdale coming up on the border of hinsdale and clarendon hills. i was on my bike with my mp3 player listening to a album called hillsong live. i was approaching the route 83 highway a area where cars and bikes and people can go under the highway which leads to a parking lot for people to park for the train and swimming pool. its a good short cut a lot of us do. write before i was about to go under route 83 i saw a thing moving with a light and i thought it was a helicopter going over route 83 and me but i didn't hear any noise and so i started turning down the volume on my mp3 player. it takes about 12 seconds for a bike to get out from underneath route 83 so that i then lost 12 seconds of seeing the sky. therefore when i got out from under the street i looked up at the sky again. i normally would of never looked up but because of seeing something before i went under that street i looked straight up after i got out from underneath the street and saw something hovering. it looked 8 stories high the size of a plastic recyclable garbage can. but it looked small because a garbage can at that height looks small. it was basically roundish but not fully round inbetween round and a egg. it was darkish/greyish. i think there was a red light at the bottom that was dimmed. since it was red towards the bottom but all basically looked the same color that's why i said it had a hint of red. it was totally staying in the same spot but at the same time moving around a lot like very very fidgety and bouncy. it looked alot more controlled then a toy remote. i read a few days after the incident that small ufos move around a lot like a boat at dock and it was something like that. i described it as bouncy and i keep those words but the word fidgety is a good word too. i stayed on my bike and just kept looking up at it as i was taking my short cut. i dont know why i didn't get off my bike to get a better look. i didn't feel scared. when i got almost a block away by the houses i glanced back and saw it still in the same spot bouncing around. the thing i saw before i went under route 83 and the thing i saw when i came back out from route 83 looked like two different things but i thought it was the same thing or related. the only reason i sent this again is because this was spotted in clarendon hills not chicago.
content.summary: Roundish, dark-grey, hovering in same spot but moving around

content.detailedDescription: I was driving out of the parking lot from work when my friend pointed up to the sky and told me to look. an orb being trailed by two small lights were flying toward my friend and i from the north east seemingly slowly. the orb was emitting a strange white light that was arcing around it very slightly. the two trailing lights seemed to be getting closer to the orb when the light surrounding the orb grew exponentially surrounding the entire object, brighter than any light i have ever seen in the sky. as it's flight path turned south, it sped up, and the distance between the two trailing lights and the orb grew quite visibly. the large bright arc of light faded and the orb turned to fly back east where in the distance it grew large and bright one last time before blinking out of visibility. the two trailing lights followed in the same direction and finally blinked out a few seconds later. the entire sighting lasted about 2 or 3 minutes.
content.summary: Orb trailed by two lights was emitting a small arc of light as it moved. it got brighter and moved faster until fading in the distance

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house when i saw this star-like object that caught my attention because it was emitting a bow wave in front of it, there was another ship behind it following the main bigger one, and then the bigger one did this huge "spray" like bow wave in mid air (looked just like the china sighting in 2010) as soon as this happened the other ship behind it divided into two smaller ships and continued to follow the bigger one....After a while they were out of our sight...But there was an electric bright blue cloud in the sky much more different than the rest that disappeared  a little bit after the ships were gone.
content.summary: Saw bright electric blue cloud and 2 objects moving away from it...

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east from longwood fl. to winter springs fl. when i spotted a bright glowing light, what struck me as odd were the three smaller bright lights that seemed to appear beneath the object, no movement to them just sitting in a row directly beneath the larger glowing object. i knew that it was not a star it was just too big. when i pulled over to take photos with my iphone i noticed the three lights disappearing in what seemed to be a fog or clou, however there were no clouds in the sky. the larger bright glowing object was still there. also there was a wavey vapor trail that was below the object but not close to the object, however you could tell that the contrail was from the object. it looked like it has coming from the ground up. this sighting went on for 10 minutes and i still took photos from my phone at my home. it then faded out and it was gone. what was left seemed to be a very bright  whispy cloud almost like the moon was behind giving off a bright look to it.
content.summary: Large bright light with three smaller brighter lights appearing to drop from bottom of object

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on the deerpark bypass in melbourne at 2:48pm 8th august 2013 when i noticed a pulsating silver\chrome oval object traveling across the sky from west to east direction, first i thought it might be a plane but it was way to fast so i thought it must be much closer to me than it looks but it disappeared behind distant clouds so it must have been higher and further away than i thought, i quickly looked around the sky and a plane caught my eye and was moving very slow in comparison and the plane looked black. i have no explanation as to what i saw.
content.summary: I was heading south, noticed pulsating chrome coloured object travel from west to east covering a large distance in seconds, lost sight as it went behind a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
As i glanced over my right shoulder from my kayak in salt river bay, st. croix usvi, i noticed a bright bluish-white light, much brighter than a planet. i first thought it was the landing light of a heavy jet, but all approaches for heavies into stx are made from the west into the prevailing easterlies and we were well east of the airport. it seemed stationery, but rapidly brightened over 15-20 seconds, much brighter than landing lights, creating a cloud halo that got more dense as the object brightened. as the object started to fade, the surrounding cloud, about the size of a dime held at arm's length, developed a hole around the object, making it appear like a thin cloud ring or torus around the object. the object faded to the brightness of a star, but bigger and hazier, and its cloud ring was fast dissipating as it passed behind a low cloud. the duration of the sighting was 30-40 seconds, and we had the impression that it was heading right for us.
a party of 14 kayakers in a different location .4 miles west of us also saw the object, and their view was not obscured at the end by the low cloud. they noted that the surrounding cloud the object dissipated and faded into nothingness.

site of sighting: 17���46'44.50" n, 64���45'03.52 w

please note that the us virgin islands is not present in your drop-down location menu on this page!

i put in alabama, but that's not correct.
content.summary: A head-on view of what youtube videos call "wormholes"

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were going for a walk around our town as we do frequently in the evenings. it was just turning dusk about 8:45 pm and the sun had already set below the tree line. the sky was very clear with only a thin clouds to the west. i looked up and saw a large bright object in the distance. i didn't think much of it at first since we live near shaw afb and see planes all the time. i looked again a few seconds later and noticed it was moving fairly slowly and slowly dimmed and brightened again. then behind the object appeared two or three small objects - like glitter - blinking faster than the main object but much smaller and dimmer. they appeared red and orange and trailed the main object for two or three minutes. 
   by that point we'd all stopped and were watching trying to figure out what it was. then we noticed what looked like a cloud started forming around it and a cone-shaped trail appeared. i started thinking maybe it's a meteor and it was just hitting the atmosphere but it never got brighter or turned into a fireball. then the tail faded (it was only there for maybe 5 seconds) and it continued as it had been. that's when i really thought something was odd because meteors don't just stop falling. we were near a line of trees and the object moved behind them so we hurried over to a nearby baseball field where we could get a better look.
   it was still visible for a couple of minutes when we got to the field and took a sudden turn away from us (to it's right) and basically continued out of sight. the whole event was at least 15 minutes. when we got home i looked for any footage or pictures of anything similar but didn't find anything. i went to a site that list the dates and times of various launches and did find one in cape canaveral, fl for the same time and date so i'm not sure if that's what we saw. as far as i know those launches don't move horizontally and change directions. if anyone can give me an explanation, i would appreciate it very much.
content.summary: Large, slow-moving bright gols object at high altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling north on rt 125 from barrington to rochester near town line. it was approx 7:45-8pm, i noticed 3 lights connected by what appeared to be wings just above the treeline. this appeared to be just over the "waste management landfill" area in rochester nh. the lights would flash and they were extremely bright. at first i thought it was a tanker from pease ang base but then realized it was too low for that and no sound. the sequence of the lights were such that first the center light would be very bright then would dim and as the center light dimmed both lights to the right and left would get extremely bright. i lost sight of it as i turned a corner, so i turned around and tried to see it again but nothing...
content.summary: Travelling north on rt 125, noticed object with 3 flashing lights then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside observing the night sky as i will usually do on warm nights as i have seen ufo activity in the past. starting from around 8:45pm (local) i was outside watching as the usual planes would pass by i was observing the stars and watching for anything unusual when an glowing orb passed overhead headed from sw and headed ne in straight line, i attributed this to possibly a satellite as it was moving at a steady pace in a straight line pattern. it took approx 5 minutes for the first one to pass from one side of the horizon to the other. no other activity was observed until 9:05pm (local) when the first of what i believe to be ufos passed by. this one started off on a path from sw to ne but while flying overhead the light from the object intensified greatly making it seem 7-10 times larger than first perceived and it course changed and headed towards the east and over the atlantic then dimmed and continued out of site fairly quickly (in comparison to a plane looked like it was moving at least 4-5 times faster at a higher altitude.) once it was out of sight more were spotted periodically headed in different directions observing the same behavior although some did not change course and 3 were observed at the same time at approximately 9:35pm (local) crossing paths in the sky right after each intensified in light and when they did two of the objects changed course as the other stayed on its straight path over the horizon. when the objects were crossing it almost seemed like they were going to collide but they crossed without incident. all the objects observed left sight fairly rapidly over the horizon or what could be gaining altitude and ascending into space. there were 10 objects witnessed between 8:45pm and 9:45pm, 9 of which i believe to be ufos as they did not exhibit behavior matching that of a plane, satellite or helicopter that i have ever seen.
content.summary: 9 consecutive objects flying overhead in different directions.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were on our rooftop deck watching the sunset behind the olympic mountains when we noticed a black orb flying south of puget sound. it moved at a relatively slow speed and at various heights. we are very familiar with aircraft due to seattle-tacoma international airport being nearby, boeing being local, and the many seaplanes and other light aircraft that frequent our skies. we observed both commercial and light aircraft before, during, and after this event, all with appropriate aviation lights clearly visible, unlike the sphere. when we attempted to photograph the object, our cameras would not focus and thus a blur was all that resulted. having done some searching on youtube, i would identify it as being like the one(s) observed and filmed over southern california and ecuador around the same time period.
content.summary: Black orb over seattle

content.detailedDescription: White/orange orb took off from top of maupuia at extreme speed after hovering and pulsing for several minutes appeared to come from behind the wellington prison. the entity was observed by myself and several others from our position on mt victoria, friends at other locations also sighted it through binocular lenses in greater detail and were amazed at it's speed in takeoff. the light source seemed to fly straight for several hundred metres on takeoff and then jet off in a complete opposite direction. it is interesting to note that a light next to the light source pulsated regularly as if energy was being drawn from it and street lights in my area died as i observed it. i was looking to capture the aurora australis on film at the time and this was the only reason that i noted the light pulsing, i called several friends to see if they could see it from their location, (better vantage point) and they certainly could. the object seemed to disappear after gaining extreme speed. it is also important to note that against the cloud in the sky many instances of dark grey looking things seemed to be almost constantly shooting upward sporadically.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White orb pulsed and then took off

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i just went out for a walk tonight around our lake in rancho santa margarita, like we normally do.  we noticed the night was beautiful and full of stars.  just as we started our walk, i looked up in south-east direction and instantly saw a slow-moving red-orange light that moved slowly in north-west direction, so i thought it was a chopper.  i kept looking though, cause it was not looking like a typical chopper with a spotlight at night, and had absolutely no sound.  it appeared to be way up higher than choppers would normally fly, probably higher than typical plane path too.  most noticeable thing about it was that the bright red-orange light was flickering/wavering a lot, again, nothing like what you'd see from a chopper.  almost like an optical distortion, not a deliberate pulsating.  so it moved slowly for a few seconds, then slowed down to an almost stop, then dimmed, turned into a light much smaller and dark blue/violet color.  the disappeared.  literally just a few steps down the lake we saw a family of women with bunch of girls looking up in wonder discussing the same thing.  i know for a fact i was not the only one that saw it last night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright wavering red-orange light moving slowly and silently around 8:40pm pt

content.detailedDescription: my interest in ufology began in 1973 my friends saw a ufo fly directly over the 1955 chevy as we returned from a jv football game.We stopped,as did two other cars i stepped out of the car as my friends were screaming for me toreturn,but i just had to seei pulled a full on walton! i could have hit it with a rock and ray charles could've seen it wasn't from here. i have seen them since then but i never acknowledge unless i have a second witness with a solid reputation. on the 17th of july took my dog out for a 1:00am pee since 1973 i've made a habit of looking up (more sightings would see them if they would only   look up.I looked up on the 17th saw 3 stars in a triangle ,they began to rotates slowly instantly i cried out for my wife who always believed me but had never seen a ufo of her own afraid she didn't hear me i bolted for the back door and was nearly shocked senseless all the time i was looking at the high altitude triangle there was a pink floyd lightshow going on behind my back to the west! i froze and starred for a good two minutes then ,oh yeah!! wife!! i ran full speed to our bedroom and said come quick outside!!! ufsaucers!!Flyin'os hurry i turned the lights off so i could get the clearest view .My wife joined me also dumbfounded and amazed. the three min.B4 my wife joined me this glass covered luminous peacock ascended straight up 1500 ft. in less than 2 seconds then right angle acrobatics  that were truly looked impossible did a little dance in the skyi screamed get the binoculars and  my eyes were seeing a most unusual sight it was now hovering just above the trees close enough to illuminate the tops of the trees a mile or less away above the appalachian trail, on the n.C-tn.Border. the field glasses revealed a glass house  silently hovering shaped more like an oblong melon   but with glass panels that resembled a diamond cut style with brilliant constant light no strobe lights at all the lights that were emanating from under the transparent skin all the lights were represented.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Took dog out at150 am spotted triange turned to get wife (2nd witness) saw amazing 2nd craft lights were eminating from within glass lue gold purple b              re

content.detailedDescription: Working on an aircraft, i looked up and saw a ball of light near the airport, the object seemed to emanate triangular shape smoke trails from time to time, the object was followed by two lights that at first seemed like an aircraft but after some observation seemed impossible to be an aircraft, the three objects desapiered in the distance, but then i noticed a "luminous cloud" in a position were the craft possibly had travel, the cloud was small and it was as if it was made out of some luminescent dust or vapor, at this time i took my phone out and took pictures of the cloud, the cloud at the time was partiality covered by other dark (normal) clouds and the light emanating from it was of a cool white like an led white color, i was able to see the cloud fade in brightness until it desapiered completely, i can assure you there was no light shining at the cloud.
content.summary: Ufo with intermittent triangular shape trail, also a luminous cloud (have pictures)

content.detailedDescription:
Saw this very glowing blue cloud like ,,, wasnt a cloud cause it didnt move as the rest of the clouds around , didnt make any sound , it just fade in 5 min .... i manage to take a few pics and use my telescope to get a better view but only a blue gas was observed 
btw the pictures do not make justice to how big , glow and even beautiful was this
content.summary: Electric blue glowing cloud liike

content.detailedDescription:
Relaxing on the deck and watching the sky.  around 8:28 p.M i noticed a light moving over my head, sw to ne. i first thought it was the iss so i checked the heavens above web site. it was not the iss. 

on saturday evening 8/3/13 at around 21:56 me and some friends watched the iss fly over at a magnitude -3.5. the sky was dark. tonight the sky was still a bit light and i'd guesstimate the magnitude to be around -1.5 to -2.0. i was able to observe the light for about 20 seconds until it disappeared into some light cloud cover. the object was star-like, no blinking and no nav lights and appeared to be traveling a little faster than the iss normally travels.

my observation position is: pioneer ca, 38.4300���n, 120.5747���w
content.summary: Brief sighting as it flew overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was washing my car, i figured it was a better idea than to do it during the day in the florida heat. something (don't know what) prompted me to look into the sky to the east. when i looked i saw a single bright light and then two lights following behing it. i know that planes are supposed to have atleast three miles between them and found it odd that these three were so close together. i called my husband over to look with me and he too said ("what the @!#$ is that.") we stared into the sky at the object(s) for about three minutes observing that it had no blinking lights, about two minutes into our observation, the first light stopped and appeared to hover in mid air. my husband pointed out that the clouds were swirling around the first single light very quickly while the two lights behind were stationary. a helecopter flew over the horizon (below the three lights in question) with red and blue flashing lights. the first light in question grew brighter and seconds later all three were gone. they literally were just gone, no traveling through the sky was noticed by my husband and myself. during the sighting we did not hear any engine sounds. only that of the helecopter.
content.summary: One bright light followed by two seperate lights (no blinking present) first light got brighter second lights remained same. helecopter appeared,first light grew brighter,  lights vanished

content.detailedDescription: We were fishing on the beach at hilton head past sundown.  i noticed three orange and bright lights in a triangle, one on top, two on the bottom.  they were only there for 10 or 15 seconds.  i could see some clouds on the horizon, even above the lights, but the sky was clear and many stars were out.  there were 7 of our family who saw the lights.  also some strangers walking on the beach saw them.  the lights apeared on and off over a 15 minute period.  there were sometimes 1, other times 2 lights.  they stayed bright and visible for 10 or 15 seconds.  they looked as if they were burning fire.  some of the showings were round, others were more of a horizontal line which started smaller and expanded wider.  there were between 6 & 8 different sightings.  all were at the same point in the sky.  they were further north than the savannah air port by maybe 60 degrees.  the sightings were all at the same place in the sky.
content.summary: Orange lights above horizon.  first seen as three lights in triangle.  later sometimes 2 & 1 light

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside in chair chatting with my neice when i noticed what i originally thought was a meteorite but this object had a prolonged existence, no tail or vapor and was traveling horizontally northerly. asked my neice if she sees the shooting star but we both realized simultaneously it wasn't a shooting star- large white sun like object but more oval shaped size of my thumb in horizon., i ran down driveway and object continued in its northerly horizontal flight but actually sped up( blipped across horizon and then out of site).  i realized at that time that this was not ordinary man made object..Also curious that there wasn't a hint of sound nor vapor trail and the speed in which this object traveled was un-earthlike.  entire event was over within 15 seconds but we are not sure if our time was affected as when i asked my niece what current time was she said it was 09:05 pm but the event happened just as dusk was happening and that was actually around 08:36 pm or so..  whether we lost time in the event and excitement bewilderment of what we had seen or just from that we had just witnessed but it didn't seem like 20 minutes or more went by..
content.summary: Just before dusk saw large light object that was traveling across the horizon at enormous speed

content.detailedDescription: On the night of the 1 of august while riding my bike,i always look up in the night sky for satellites and or planes.At first i thought it was a air force cargo plane that regularly fly from that direction with landing lights on to land at dover afb.  i observed two orange yellow lights coming towards me at about 20 degrees from horizon. the two lights grew to 6 lighting up sequentially two at a time  on either side of the original two, until it was a 6 light chevron. perfectly spaced.  it stayed visible for only a few seconds and than went out. i can't remember if they went out in sequence. but in another few seconds they came back on as a semicircle only to go out sequentially from left to right , again they only stayed visible for two to three seconds
content.summary: Observed two lights ,that quickly became chevron shape for few seconds then go out to reform into a semi-circle

content.detailedDescription:
A delta rocket took off at 8.29 tonight.  as it approach the vero area, and continued on a south east tragetory, it deployed its solid rocket boosters.  they got brighter and then seemed to be followed by four bright lights following behind the still bright rocket.

i have lived in vero for 16 yrs and witnessed many launches from the cape but i have never ever seen lights like this.  they somehow end seemed to follow,course of delta but got brighter, all 4 lights flickering in non sequential bursts.  clearly, they were all connected as they were always equidstant to each other.  neighbors saw it aw well.  it continued to seem to very slowly descend all the while following the course of the rocket.

one neighbor thought it was lights on the rockets that were deployed coming descending but all 4 lights remained the same distance fro each other.
content.summary: Tonight's delta rocket launched & the 4 lights followed the solid rocket booster jettison.   lights blinked and got brighter, bigger but as soon as delta rocket disappeared, so did the lights.  it also seemed like the lights were all connected  as a disc.

content.detailedDescription: Working in sunroom i noticed a bright orange orb/globe in the ne sky by the tree line at approx 55 to 60 degrees on the horizon looked like the sun but much smaller kind of like the flame of a rocket seen from below.  once i stopped what i was doing and further looked saw four additional lights appear to the north directly behind the orange orb and they moved in unison...  thought i was seeing things and that it was possibly some kind of reflection so i called the wife to come out and when we both returned to the same approximate viewing area to look all of the lights seen were at a greater height approx 70 degrees on the horizon moving to the east and through the cloud cover.  when i first noticed the object, i thought perhaps it was a satellite or the international space station and just the setting sun causing a reflection, but the other four lights that then appeared and seemed to trail the first made me suspect of that explanation.  on the north to south trajectory they did not appear to move fast - just steady, but when going to the east and gaining altitude the speed appeared to at least double.  no real reaction except that it seemed weird to observe something like this ��� like some kind of weird sci-fi flick.  i would think there has to be some kind of rationale explanation, if it had just been the orange orb/globe than i suppose it was the sun reflecting on something���  the four white lights in a diamond pattern, which stayed in unison with it, are what threw my wife and i a curve.  we lost sight of the objects in the movement to the east and the increase in elevation when finally blocked by cloud formation.
content.summary: At approx 2020 hrs observed an orange globe/fireball in ne sky then 4 other lights forming diamond

content.detailedDescription: I am a united states air force dual qualified weather observer/forecaster and was on duty at homestead air reserve base when i decided to go outside to have a cigarette by the flightline; i noticed a glowing light to my ne, initially thinking it was either a satellite or a meteor. it was moving to slow to be a meteor, so i thought it to be a satellite glowing due to the sun angle and aparent height of the object (i often watch satellites at night). the object created a bow wave *) in front of it then broke into 3 distinct parts, 1 large and 2 small with the large in the front. the large object remained illuminated whitish while the 2 small objects appeared to blink off and on in a red/orange-ish color, opposite of each other yet with a regular pattern. continuing in a north to south route the objects created another bow wave *) as it appeared to slow. by this point the 3 objects were due east of my location, the bow wave *) subsided as the objects reached a se direction from where i was observing and appeared to stop momentarily before proceeding e and out of sight. a glowing noctilucent cloud remained where the object initially appeared to enter the atmosphere and create the first bow wave *), i stayed for 15 minutes as the noctilucent cloud slowly dissipated. i have never observed anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Initially thought it was a satellite or meteor moving n to s, broke into 3 pieces slowed and turned e

content.detailedDescription:
As an amatuer astronomer, i am aware of planetary positions and moon phases, without even looking; on wednesday, august 7, 2013, i lay prostrate on my driveway at dusk at 8:25 pm eastern and my 9 yr old son came outside to lay down next to me a few minutes later. about 8:30 pm, he looked east toward where we have watched shuttle launches, at about the same angle, and  he saw a bright orange sphere that i would guess was 100 miles over the atlantic. i first thought it could not be an airplane and was confused that it surely was not a planet, being slightly larger and much brighter. i am familiar with the landing patterns and paths the airlines take toward orlando on a daily basis, over me. there has never been an airline or object other than the shuttle travel out that direction. i wondered if it was planetary but it began to descend slowly. my son stood up to follow it descend and suddenly two more dimmer and smaller spheres appeared very close to the original object and moved very close to the original object. then another appeared closely above, more dim; i ran in to get the video camera. my duaghter, wife and son all observed the phenomenon. the smaller ones moved very close to the original shpere. they started to dim and descend. they were not chinese lanterns. these were distant objects. i have video of the latter. it just happend about 30 minutews ago. i will post on youtube with ufo over atlantic east of daytona beach.
i will own the rights to the video and it cannot be used without permission.
content.summary: As an amatuer astronomer, i know my planets, sky etc. poss.Over atlantic; large orange sphere; 3-4 others appeared and moverd randomly; awesome!

content.detailedDescription: At 830pm on tuesday i passed by my window and noticed that a green orb-like object shot into the sky at a speed that i hadn't seen before. i had seen the same type of craft last week and weeks before that in the same direction. the craft shot up into the sky, hovered around, changed colors, turned the lights off, turned them on again, and then fell into treetops. then a few minutes later it did the same thing. i recorded the scene the best that i could with my camera and ipad.
content.summary: Colorful ufo seen in west la, shooting up into sky, falling,  disappearing again and again

content.detailedDescription:
Mother and i were sitting in front of the barn on her property in northern az
it was about 9pm and it was the end of aug. we saw a bright light quickly racing towards us from the sw horizon. i thought it was an airplane coming in towards the barn to clip it's wheels on the roof to help it slow down to crash land. i was so scared and i screamed at mother to run behind the barn, that it was an airplane going to crash. mother didn't think it was an airplane. she wasn't scared. she was fascinated! just as i thought we were going to die, it came to an abrupt stop very close to us. it wasn't very high now that it reached us. it stopped in mid air about 20ft away. it was hovering low. i thought i was going to have cardiac arrest until it had stopped. i said to mother, "that's not an airplane" then together we said, "it's a ufo!" mother began walking towards it ahead of me. we were astonished! this huge illuminating light pulsated directly in front of us as it hover there. though the light was huge in the sky it didn't light the ground. as it descended towards the ground mother and i tried to run to it but we had to be careful of the brush on the raw prairie land. i was no longer frightened and we wanted to get close to it, to see what it was, what it looked like, but just as we got close it began to slowly ascend forming a cloud in front of it. it continued to slowly ascent upward but we could still see the light through the cloud only it wasn't as bright,it had dulled through the cloudy cigar shaped vapor. right before our eyes we watched this glowing light through the cloud as it ascended. as it slowly ascended the light got smaller and the cloud got smaller and it kept getting smaller and smaller until poof....It was gone. we were so disappointed that it had ascended upwards before we could get close enough to get a real good look at it. mother and i were amazed that we had a close encounter and we still are amazed. one thing troubles us though, we remember the light coming and then leaving but we don't remember what we did after it left. i don't know why we didn't call the sheriff to report such an incredible experience. before this ufo sighting, i didn't believe in ufo's, but i'm a true  believer now! mother and i were two women alone out beneath the sparkling stars in the open wilderness where mother's home is. still to this day i can look up in the sky outside mother's home and see strange lights moving around. i want to know what this ufo is. i have since seen the movie 'fire in the sky' about a young man living in snowflake az who claims to have been abducted. what travis walton describes he and his buddies saw, is a lot like what mother and i witnessed and they were both in close proximity. delaine snyder
content.summary: A super fast light raced towards us in at my mother's property in n.Az. it reached us and decended. mother and i walked toward it. it ascended forming a large cloud in front of light. we could see light through cloud. it slowly ascended and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: There was no ufo involved in this incident, but i've never seen an animal mutilated like this, so i thought i'd report it. it looks to be a squirrel and appears as if something grabbed the head and pulled it hard enough to pull the entire inside of the animal out. the carcass is literally inside out. some of the legs look long because part of the bones are still hanging from when the inside of the animal was ripped through the neck area. there was what might be the squirrel's nest laying right next to it under our tree. so this could be a matter of a hawk attacking the squirrel in it's nest, tearing the head of with such power that it pulled the entire insides of the squirrel through it's neck, and the struggle was such that it knocked the nest from the tree.
content.summary: Animal mutilation
